info.orestes.rest.conversion

Interface Context

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ReadableContext, Request, Response, WritableContext
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EntityContent.EntityWriter, EntityResponseListener.EntityReader, RestRequest, RestResponse, SimpleContext

    public interface Context

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> T getArgument(java.lang.String name)
      Returns the matched and converted RestMethod argument if the ConversionHandler had previously processed the Request otherwise the string value
      default <T> T getArgument(java.lang.String name, T def)
      Returns the matched and converted RestMethod argument if the ConversionHandler had previously processed the Request otherwise the string value.
      void setArgument(java.lang.String name, java.lang.Object value)
      Set the matched RestMethod argument to the given value.

    • Method Detail

      • getArgument

        <T> T getArgument(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the matched and converted RestMethod argument if the ConversionHandler had previously processed the Request otherwise the string value
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the returning parameter
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the method argument

      • getArgument

        default <T> T getArgument(java.lang.String name,
                          T def)
        Returns the matched and converted RestMethod argument if the ConversionHandler had previously processed the Request otherwise the string value. If no parameter is set, the default value will be returned.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the returning parameter
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the method argument
        def - The default value to return when no paramater value is set

      • setArgument

        void setArgument(java.lang.String name,
                 java.lang.Object value)
        Set the matched RestMethod argument to the given value. This method is used to set extracted arguments form the request entity.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the method argument
        value - The new value for the argument
